Steps.StepString: Visit the website and inspect the source code.
Call a JavaScript beautifier to make the JavaScript code more readable.
Evaluate the obfuscated function using the browser's Developer Tools console in order to read its values.
Replace the function calls with hardcoded values to improve readability.
Determine that authentication is done using substrings.
Identify the substrings composing the flag, taking note of the overlaps.
Turn the JavaScript code into a Python array assignment script and execute it to obtain the flag.
Allow exec to slip into the code to obtain the flag.
